summary.location: The Hills Hotel, Laguna Hills, California

submission_info.submission_guidelines: Authors are invited to submit an 8-page (regular), 4-page (short), and 2-page (poster and demo) manuscript in double-column IEEE format. Manuscripts must be written in English and follow the instructions in the Manuscript Formatting and Templates page.

requirements: Only electronic submission will be accepted.
Manuscripts may only be submitted in PDF format.
submission_details.review_process: All paper submissions will be carefully reviewed by at least three experts. Reviews will be returned to the author(s) with comments to ensure the high quality of accepted papers.
submission_details.originality: Authors must guarantee that their paper will be presented at the conference and that it is original material owned by the authors.

summary.event: IEEE Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (AIxSE)

important_dates.description: Main Conference and Workshop Registration Deadline

summary.description: Artificial Intelligence x Software Engineering (AIxSE) is an international forum for academia and industries to exchange visions and ideas in the state of the art and practice, as well as to identify the emerging topics and define the synergy between the research in AI and SE in general.

publication_details.inclusion_info: Accepted papers will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore subject to meeting IEEE Xploreâ€™s scope and quality requirements.
publication_details.awards_info: Distinguished quality papers presented at the conference will be selected for the best paper/poster awards and for publication in internationally renowned journals.

topics: Symbolic AI including Knowledge and data engineering, planning

summary.community_invitation: You are invited to join the AIxSE community to receive new announcements and notifications from the conference by email.
summary.call_for_contributions: Authors are invited to submit an 8-page (regular), 4-page (short), and 2-page (poster and demo) manuscript in double-column IEEE format.
